alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 01 at 8:08PM PST until March 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Ventura County Inland Coast, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
